message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $115.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $110 is a fair price, I'm looking to get closer to $115.  Would you consider $112?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $112. Can we meet in the middle at $111? That would be a more comfortable price for me.
